summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to and extensions of the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for plans and specifications, acquisition of property and preliminary construction work preparatory to construction of the Boundary hydroelectric project - F.P.C. \#2144 - on the Pend Oreille River, declaring the estimated cost thereof and providing for payment from an appropriation therefor by Ordinance 90439.
